Consider the Gamma Distribution where we know $\alpha=2$, that is:

$$ f(y_i|\beta_i) = y \beta_i^2 \exp(-\beta_i y_i) \quad y_i\in (0,\infty)$$

Put this in exponential dispersion family form and find $\theta_i$, $b(\theta_i)$ and $E[y_i]$
